price: ពួកគេឆ្លើយថាៈ ពួកយើងបានរស់នៅតែមួយថ្ងៃ ឬកន្លះ ថ្ងៃប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដូចេ្នះសូមទ្រង់មេត្ដាសួរអ្នកដែលចេះគណនា(ពីថ្ងៃខែ) ទៅ។
arabic: قَالُواْ لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡعَآدِّينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qālū labith'nā yawman aw baʿḍa yawmin fasali al-ʿādīna
